posts.post_content:
Hi all, 

Please see [URL="https://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=284527"]this thread[/URL] for the original posts and additional detail. Photos are also below. 

I've had lots of inquires about these T-card and Goudey frames. I've found the only way to get them to a reasonable cost is to order in large quantities. I'm offering pre-order for various quantities, at a discounted price, in hopes of meeting the minimums required. I recognize this cost still may not appeal to some. It's truly surprising how hard it is to source suitable stock at a reasonable price. 

These are 100% acid free and made to hold a single card in a standard size top loader. Please find available quantities and order details [URL="https://www.prewarprints.com/#4"]here[/URL]. 

** Pre-order until 8/31. I expect all frame orders to begin shipping in early-October.**

Noting that I do not have any additional sizes or styles at this time. Depending on the demand for these I can certainly consider that in the future. 

Thanks for the interest! Feel free to contact me with questions. 

[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/SnrwC0F/IMG-1135.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/55zpRbG/IMG-1136.jpg[/IMG]
Are the tobacco card inserts with a lower opening to allow for diy labels ?
Sorry Brent, they are not. That was the reason for my PM this morning.
